Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time spent in Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION when followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to the next occurrence of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total elapsed time between Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that eventually reach approval
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to be followed by a resubmission (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE) compared to the average time for Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR to be followed by a resubmission
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Minimum resolution time of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION in variants that include multiple rejections by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from case start to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION in rejected-only variants versus variants that later lead to Payment Handled
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time between Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION and Payment Handled in cases where the process eventually completes successfully
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Cycle time of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION compared to cycle time of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time spent in all rejection-related activities (including Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE, etc.) versus time spent in approval-related activities in the same variant
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to Request Payment in variants that loop back and eventually complete
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'
